name: Sixbell
description:
Integrate all your digital channels
Enrich your Genesys Contact Center by integrating social networks, digital messaging and video calls.

PureSocial enriches your Genesys Contact Center, adding powerful functionalities, such as:

Video call: allow your agents to escalate to a video call from chat, email, voice, or social media. Video calls are compatible with the most used devices and operating systems, including iOS and Android.
Social Media integration: Enable Social Customer Care. Receive feedback from your customers on your Social Media channels:
Facebook Wall
Twitter (Mentions and Direct Messages)
Instagram (Public Messages)
Youtube
Digital Messaging integration: Let your clients reach your business through:
Facebook Messenger
WhatsApp
Telegram
Viber
